extension.name: System - Benchmark
extension.author: RuposTel s.r.o.
extension.description:
Provides benchmark support for Joomla 3.x
This plugin loads from /defines.php. No core files get ovewritten.
Usage:
1. Visit benchmark plugin backend, enable it and click Apply
2. It installs defines.php (see messages)
3. Press F12 in Firefox or Chrome and view Javascript console at your front end
This extension is provided by RuposTel.com Please use our forum for support enqueries. Implemented on J3.4.8
